short_description: Push puller is the best pulling choice when threaded holes are not available
Great solution for many applications like: heavy-duty pinion bearings, side bearings, alternators, generators, power steering and crankshaft pulleys, timing gears, harmonic balancers, and more
Features a classic 'H Bar' style puller block accommodating a 7 inch to 11 inch application spread
Comes with 2 sets of forged jaws for a pulling reach range of 5 inches to 9 inches; two forcing screws are included for short and long pulls

product_description: OTC's 7-Ton Multi Purpose Bearing and Puller Set offers a bearing or pulley tool solution featuring a classic 'H Bar' style puller block accommodating a 7 inch to 11 inch application spread. It comes with 2 sets of forged jaws for a pulling reach range of 5 inches to 9 inches - tempered for heavy-duty applications. Two forcing screws are included for short and long pulls. Where a push puller is the best pulling choice when threaded holes are not available, the 4532 provides technicians and shops with a solution for many applications like heavy-duty pinion bearings, side bearings, alternators, generators, power steering and crankshaft pulleys, timing gears and harmonic balancers. Great for deep set transmission gears and A/C clutches as well as roller gears on tracked vehicles and locking collars on pivot shafts. Value is at the core of the OTC tool and equipment portfolio. For a simple repair or the most complex drivability concern, these award-winning tools universally solve problems faster, and at better value, than any other product line available. Whether it’s a specialty tool or unique piece of service equipment, OTC provides top solutions to modern automotive service challenges while increasing technicians’ productivity and shop profits.

name: VEVOR Bearing Puller Kit 14-Piece, 5 Ton Bearing Separator, Pinion Wheel Bearing Removal Kit with 2" and 3" Jaws, Bearing Separator and Puller Set, Heavy Duty Bearing Splitter Tool Kit with Case
short_description: Two Sizes, Unlimited Compatibility: Our bearing puller set comes with two different separator sizes. The large bearing separator jaw provides an adjustable range of 2.0-2.8 inches (Ø50-Ø70 mm), while the small bearing separator jaw adjusts from 1.2-2.0 inches (Ø30-Ø50mm). This versatility makes our bear puller set suitable for various bearing, gear, pulley, and steering wheel sizes.

Up to 5 Tons of Force: With a maximum pull capacity of 5 tons, our bearing splitter tool kit can handle most vehicles, all-terrain vehicles, and light trucks. The knife-shaped taper feature enhances grip, ensuring a secure hold on the bearing, preventing slippage, and enabling efficient disassembly even in tight spaces.

Precision Operation: Assemble the extension screws quickly, and the extension screw provides ample operating space to handle bearings of different sizes. You can also attach 2 puller legs for a claw-type pulling approach, suitable for both horizontal and vertical operations. The 8.8-grade thread on the screw ensures high strength and powerful pressure, while the ball-end screw makes rotation easier, ensuring uniform force distribution.

Built to Last: Crafted from high-hardness 45# steel, our pinion wheel bearing removal kit is designed to resist deformation and damage. Heat treatment strengthens the steel, making it durable. All the components are coated with an anti-rust coating that is resistant to wear and tear and provides protection against corrosion from chemicals and oil.

Complete 14-Piece Set: Our bearing separator set includes 2 separators, 4 hex push-puller legs, 4 extension screws, 1 lead screw, 2 puller legs, and 1 yoke. Everything is neatly organized in a dustproof and waterproof storage box, making it easy to carry and store. This comprehensive bearing splitter tool kit ensures you have the right tool for the job every time.

name: 3" 4" 6" 8" Gear Puller Set, 2-Jaw/3-Jaw Bearing Puller Kit with Ratchet Wrench, Heavy Duty Pulling Tool, Reversible Jaw for Internal External Flywheel Gear Pulley Bearing Rotor Removal
short_description: Professional Puller Set: SEEKSELF Pullers are forged from high-strength heat-treated CrV steel, and equipped with thickened connecting plates and non-slip spacers for light/heavy duty work. It also comes with a labor-saving ratchet wrench and sockets, detailed instruction manual, sturdy blow-molded storage box and beautiful packaging.

Reversible 2 or 3 Jaws Design: For easy storage, the tool needs to be assembled. Can be assembled as a two or three jaw puller (sharing the same set of brackets). Reversible jaws make it possible to convert from an external to an internal puller. Comes with detailed illustrated instructions and wrenches.

Application: It can be used to remove gears, bearings, flywheels, hubs, ball races, crank pulleys, stuck rotors and sprockets, etc. (Before purchase, measure whether it meets the maximum working range of the pullers).

Size Range: 4 different sizes of gear pullers are available by assembly. The maximum reach can exceed 3", 4", 6" and 8" (i.e. 75mm/100mm/150mm/200mm) when mounted to the lower mounting holes, and can be extended to 4.7", 6.7", 7.5" and 9.1" (i.e. 120mm/170mm/190mm/230mm) when switched to the upper mounting holes, covering common size ranges.

Packing List: This Gear Bearing Puller Kit includes 4 sets of Jaw Pullers (assembly required), 1PCS 3/8-Inch Drive Ratchet Wrench with 3PCS Sockets(15mm, 18mm, 20mm), 2 sets of open-end wrenches are used for installation. It also comes with a nice instruction manual and packaging.

Quality and Durability: The Gear Bearing Removal Tool set is suitable for both light and heavy work. The tool is forged from heat-treated CrV steel, which ensures the strength and durability of the Jaws and Ejector Rod. The surface of the jaw is finely polished, and the appearance texture is better. The thickened connecting plates, non-slip gaskets, and reinforced ejector rods make heavy-duty work more reliable.

Tips: 1. Before operation, make sure that all jaws have firmly grasped the gears/bearings, etc.; 2. The set already includes the wrenches needed for assembly and disassembly. 2. Use the included wrench, or use it with your impact wrench, which is more labor-saving.

short_description: Complete 4-Piece Set: Get the job done right with our professional 4-piece gear puller set. The kit includes 4 pcs gear puller with different Max. Spread (3", 4", 6", and 8") to handle a wide range of disassembly work like gears, pulleys, bearings, and flywheels. Perfect for mechanics, repair garages, and more.

Flexible Jaw Conversion: Effortlessly switch between a two-jaw and three-jaw pulley puller for versatile pulling power. Use two jaws for strong pulling force, ideal for small bearings and gears. Three jaws form a stable triangular structure, perfect for securely gripping heavy components during disassembly.

Reversible Jaw Design: Install the jaws in reverse for better grip on small-diameter hollow components in narrow spaces. Install the jaws in the forward direction to effortlessly grasp larger components and adapt to various machine parts. With double hole adjustment, the hook claw range is expanded, making it more adaptable.

Enhanced Durability: Thanks to the addition of 12 locking nuts that strengthen the connection between the jaws and reduce the risk of detachment over time or during conversions. You can expect a reliable, high-quality product that will last.

Industrial Grade Strength: This screw rod has been quenched and forged at high temperatures to make it incredibly durable. The jaws have undergone precision processing to ensure a strong grip. Made from tough industrial grade 45# steel, our gear puller set boasts a rust and corrosion-resistant coating for added longevity.
